data.title: The Best Soup on The Planet
data.text: I have to travel from Toronto to Columbus once a month, sometimes twice, and I always make sure that I stop in at Market 65 for a salad and some of the best soup I have ever tasted.  All local, all made with love.  You have to try this place.

data.title: clean and delicious eating
data.text: My mom and I stopped here before we went to see "Wicked" at the Ohio Theater (which I know a lot of people stopped in this place). It was quick, fresh, clean, and delicious! We didn't have to wait long for our food and the two guys working were very helpful and nice. I got the Pacific (tofu wrap) which was SO delicious! I think it was the crispy tofu with the pineapple that made it so yummy. My mom had the Diablo (I think) salad and a soup, she said the salad was very spicy but she enjoyed it. If ever I'm at the Ohio Theater again, I'm going to go back for that tofu wrap again. :D

data.title: Just before the show
data.text: Went to see "Wicked" at the Ohio Theater and this place is next door. Stopped in for lunch, it is a wrap/salad place. Have a great selection of toppings and fillers for the wraps and salads. I enjoyed the cob salad. My wife had a basic Italian salad. We waiting in line for a while as they make each salad to order in front of you. Total was $20.50 for 2 salads and 2 drinks. The salads were big!

data.title: Best salads in Cbus!
data.text: Market 65 is a place I greatly miss. Since I no longer work downtown, I miss those amazing salads either off the menu or build your own. Everything is either local and/or organic and the dressing are seriously tasty.

data.title: Perfect for quick and healthy!!!
data.text: We came upon this place when we went to see Wicked at the Ohio Theatre and loved it!  Very cute and the food is all grown locally!  The wraps and salads are WONDERFUL!   Loved the outside eating area by the fountain in the shade on a beautiful day!!!

data.title: Great place to grab healthy food on the run
data.text:
I just ate at Market 65. 
The food was really fresh, locally grown and the service was great. 

I created my own wrap with black beans, almonds, bell peppers, pepper jack and chicken. Pesto dressing. 

Tasted so good and I don't feel gross after eating. 

Peanut Butter cookie was a nice touch.

data.title: LOVE their salads
data.text: Such good salads and you can add anything in it you want!!  YUMMY!!!  They also have wraps which I have had in the past.  They are just as good as the salads, just depends on what you are hungry for.

data.title: Great Salads - vegan friendly and locally grown options
data.text: Great mix or match salads.  Vegan and vegetarian options.  The only complaint I have is they aren't open late, open only from 11-2pm on Saturdays and closed on Sundays considering not much else in the area.

data.title: Some plant based choices, some vegan
data.text:
We arrived for our first visit here, on a Friday about 5pm.  There was no line, so we got waited on quickly, but it was a little confusing about where to pay.  A few people after us got their food before us; the guy who took our order said he had forgotten to give it to the guy making our salads.  Not like they were busy either.

Our salads were good, and we enjoyed the fact that we could take them outside to eat under the trees on the nice patio out front.  It was a beautiful night to sit outside, and the patio was far enough from the street that it was pleasant.

data.title: This is my downtown fresh choice!
data.text: I am in downtown Columbus frequently, and this is my favorite place to pop in for a salad.  Great for eating alone or with a small group.  Not a lot of seating for large parties.  Great place for a to go salad if you are staying in a downtown hotel and want something healthy to take back to your room.  Enjoy!

data.title: Great salads
data.text: The salads are excellent.  Whether you get the made to order and pick all the individual items you want or one of the ones on the menu.  Always fresh and always delicious.

data.title: Ok but very over priced-- don't get the hype
data.text: This place has friendly employees and managers but that's all I remember about my experience, oh and the $9.50 salad!??! Are you serious... way overpriced. I don't understand the hype about this place. The salad was delicious but not worth the price.

data.title: Awesome
data.text: This restaurant was fantastic the concept is really good as the place serves salads and different types of burritos the staff is very friendly and you can make your own salad

data.title: Love this place
data.text: I've been getting my meals from here for a long time. Everytime I'm in Ohio I consider Market 65 as the perfect place for healthy, quick and fresh salad. I love the fact that you can build your own with so many choices of toppings, the price is super affordable, I think it was like $9 for a big salad, plus the staff is helpful and nice, they really try to give you the best customized salad they can. The only problem is that clases at 7.30pm which makes it a little complicated for me to go grab dinner after work.

data.title: Healthy & yummy
data.text: Stumbled on this when staying at adjacent Sheraton.  Very good salad!  Try a specialty tea.  Wish i would have gotten dessert!  Very fresh & yummy.  Not cheap but worth it I think for a fresh, convenient meal.

data.title: Large Portions!
data.text: Market 65 is in a great location downtown if you work or live in the vicinity of the Columbus Commons. The quality of the ingredients and the staff are phenomenal. Very friendly and personable. The salad portion sizes are huge so be prepared to get the salad to go just so you have a container to take it home in.

data.title: Fantastic lunch!!!!
data.text:
A very cool concept for salads....think Chipotle.  There are several house options to select or you can create your own.

I went with the Steakhouse and was not disappointed. The portion was immense! The steak was fabulous as well as the mushrooms and cheese combination.

There is a bar....but alas, had to go back to work.

data.title: Delicious!
data.text: The food and atmosphere of Market 65 can be summed up in one word: wonderful! Everything I've had so far has been delicious, not too heavy,  but still very filling. They also are open until just before shows at the Ohio Theater, so plan accordingly for great food and great entertainment!

data.title: Best Salad Ever
data.text: Really great place to crate your own unique, fresh salad. You can also choose from their own creations. So good!

data.title: Great, Fresh Salads!
data.text: Salads are their speciality and they do an excellent job with these dining delights.  Lots of options for toppings, dressings, etc.  At peak times, the lines can get a little long.  When the weather is nice, they have a wonderful shaded patio area with nice views of the Statehouse, etc.
